=AS3Dmod HOWTO=

This document provides information on how to use AS3Dmod on a basic level. It assumes that the user has one of the supported AS3 3D engines present in his CLASSPATH. 

Currently supported engines are: 

  #[Papervision3d http://blog.papervision3d.org]
  #[Awat3d http://www.away3d.com]
  #[Sandy3d http://www.flashsandy.org]
  #[Alternativa3d http://alternativaplatform.com/en/]
